msg.msgText:
A "HighAvailability" composite object can be updated using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver update HighAvailability help imaserver update HighAvailability "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver update HighAvailability "EnableHA=True" "Group=TestHAPair"
Configuration items for "HighAvailability" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
